pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FOSSLight Binary Scanner [![REUSE status](https://api.reuse.software/badge/github.com/fosslight/fosslight_binary_scanner)](https://api.reuse.software/info/github.com/fosslight/fosslight_binary_scanner)## üí° IntroductionIt searches for a binary and outputs OSS information if there is an identical or similar binary from the Binary DB.## üìñ User GuideWe describe the user guide in the FOSSLight guide page.Please see the [**User Guide**](https://fosslight.org/fosslight-guide-en/scanner/4_binary.html) for more information on how to install and run it.## üëè Contributing GuideWe always welcome your contributions. Please see the [CONTRIBUTING guide](https://fosslight.org/fosslight-guide-en/learn/1_contribution.html) for how to contribute.## üìÑ LicenseFOSSLight Binary Scanner is Apache-2.0, as found in the [LICENSE][l] file.[l]: https://github.com/fosslight/fosslight_binary_scanner/blob/main/LICENSE
